verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w taketh|strong="G3880"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bringeth|strong="G0399"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G0399"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w an|strong="G3735"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w apart|strong="G2398"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* was \w transfigured|strong="G3339"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* did \w shine|strong="G2989"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* \w talking|strong="G4814"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* for \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*: \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w wilt|strong="G2309"\w*, let us \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w tabernacles|strong="G4633"\w*; \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*.

\w While|strong="G2980"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w a|strong="G3507"\w* \w bright|strong="G5460"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \w overshadowed|strong="G1982"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*, which \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I am well \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*; hear \w ye|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G0191"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, they \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G5399"\w* \w sore|strong="G4970"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Arise|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w afraid|strong="G5399"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they had lifted \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, \w save|strong="G1487"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2597"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* came \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w charged|strong="G1781"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Tell|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w the vision|strong="G3705"\+w* \+w to no man|strong="G3367"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w be risen again|strong="G0450"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Elias|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w truly|strong="G3303"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4412"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w restore|strong="G0600"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w Elias|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w already|strong="G2235"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they knew|strong="G1921"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w have done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w they listed|strong="G2309"\+w*. \+w Likewise|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G3195"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w suffer|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5259"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w understood|strong="G4920"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* the \w Baptist|strong="G0910"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, there \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w a|strong="G0444"\w* \add certain\add* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, kneeling \w down|strong="G1120"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, have \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w* \w on|strong="G5207"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he is \w lunatick|strong="G4583"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sore|strong="G2560"\w* \w vexed|strong="G3958"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w ofttimes|strong="G4178"\w* he \w falleth|strong="G4098"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w oft|strong="G4178"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G3101"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w cure|strong="G2323"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w O|strong="G5599"\+w* \+w faithless|strong="G0571"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w perverse|strong="G1294"\+w* \+w generation|strong="G1074"\+w*, \+w how|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w long|strong="G4219"\+w* \+w shall I be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*? \+w how|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w long|strong="G4219"\+w* \+w shall I suffer|strong="G0430"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*? \+w bring|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hither|strong="G5602"\+w* \+w to me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1140"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w child|strong="G3816"\w* was \w cured|strong="G2323"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* that \w very|strong="G1565"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* to \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w apart|strong="G2398"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Because|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0570"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w unbelief|strong="G0570"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w a grain|strong="G2848"\+w* \+w of mustard seed|strong="G4615"\+w*, \+w ye shall say|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G3735"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w mountain|strong="G3735"\+w*, \+w Remove|strong="G3327"\+w* \+w hence|strong="G1782"\+w* \+w to yonder place|strong="G1563"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it shall remove|strong="G3327"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w shall be impossible|strong="G0101"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w kind|strong="G1085"\+w* \+w goeth|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w but|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w prayer|strong="G4335"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w fasting|strong="G3521"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w while|strong="G0390"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w abode|strong="G0390"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G3195"\+w* \+w be betrayed|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the hands|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they shall kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w third|strong="G5154"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w he shall be raised again|strong="G1453"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G3076"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G4970"\w* \w sorry|strong="G3076"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, they that \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w tribute|strong="G1323"\w* \add money\add* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Doth|strong="G5055"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w master|strong="G1320"\w* \w pay|strong="G5055"\w* \w tribute|strong="G1323"\w*?

He \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he was \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w prevented|strong="G4399"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w thinkest|strong="G1380"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Simon|strong="G4613"\+w*? \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the kings|strong="G0935"\+w* \+w of the earth|strong="G1093"\+w* \+w take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w custom|strong="G5056"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w tribute|strong="G2778"\+w*? \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w their own|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w strangers|strong="G0245"\+w*?\wj*

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Of|strong="G0575"\w* \w strangers|strong="G0245"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G5346"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Then|strong="G0686"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1658"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Notwithstanding|strong="G2443"\+w*, \+w lest|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w we should offend|strong="G4624"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w go thou|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the sea|strong="G2281"\+w*, \+w and cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w an hook|strong="G0044"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w the fish|strong="G2486"\+w* \+w that|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4412"\+w* \+w cometh up|strong="G0305"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w when thou hast opened|strong="G0455"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w mouth|strong="G4750"\+w*, \+w thou shalt find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w a piece of money|strong="G4715"\+w*: \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w take|strong="G2983"\+w*, \+w and give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w for|strong="G0473"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4675"\+w*.\wj*
